ygData.subject: Re: Rainbow Festival
ygData.msgSnippet: David, I totally missed the festival posting, can you repost? I look forward to a chance to get together with everyone on Brell to play. We have a lot of great
ygData.messageBody:
David,

I totally missed the festival posting, can you repost?

I look forward to a chance to get together with everyone on Brell to play.
We have a lot of great people on this mailing list, and I think it'll be
really fun to give the guild a kick start so we can all start playing
together 8)

As a master smith, and master jewler, I look forward to giving guild
members stuff at cost. If you're already on the server, just send me a
tell.

- Christina (Luna)
